subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the FileUploader UI component.

subMembers.name: abortUpload
subMembers.description: A function that cancels the file upload.

subMembers.name: accept
subMembers.description: Specifies file types users can select in the Open File dialog. The default value accepts all file types.

subMembers.name: allowCanceling
subMembers.description: Specifies if an end user can remove a file from the selection and interrupt uploading.

subMembers.name: allowedFileExtensions
subMembers.description: Restricts file extensions that can be uploaded to the server.

subMembers.name: chunkSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the chunk size in bytes. Applies only if [uploadMode] is *"instantly*" or *"useButtons"*. Requires a server that can process file chunks.

subMembers.name: dialogTrigger
subMembers.description: Specifies the HTML element which invokes the file upload dialog.

subMembers.name: dropZone
subMembers.description: Specifies the HTML element in which users can drag and drop files for upload.

subMembers.name: extendSelection
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not an end user is allowed to add files to the current file's uploading list.

subMembers.name: hoverStateEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the **FileUploader** component changes the state of all its buttons when users hover over them.

subMembers.name: inputAttr
subMembers.description: Specifies the attributes to be passed on to the underlying `<input>` element of the `file` type.

subMembers.name: invalidFileExtensionMessage
subMembers.description: The text displayed when the extension of the file being uploaded is not an [allowed file extension].

subMembers.name: invalidMaxFileSizeMessage
subMembers.description: The text displayed when the size of the file being uploaded is greater than the [maxFileSize].

subMembers.name: invalidMinFileSizeMessage
subMembers.description: The text displayed when the size of the file being uploaded is less than the [minFileSize].

subMembers.name: labelText
subMembers.description: Specifies the text displayed on the area to which an end user can drop a file.

subMembers.name: maxFileSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the maximum file size (in bytes) allowed for uploading. Applies only if [uploadMode] is *"instantly*" or *"useButtons"*.

subMembers.name: minFileSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum file size (in bytes) allowed for uploading. Applies only if [uploadMode] is *"instantly*" or *"useButtons"*.

subMembers.name: multiple
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the UI component enables an end user to select a single file or multiple files.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: Specifies the value passed to the **name** attribute of the underlying **input** element. Required to access uploaded files on the server.

subMembers.name: progress
subMembers.description: Gets the current progress in percentages.

subMembers.name: readyToUploadMessage
subMembers.description: The message displayed by the UI component when it is ready to upload the specified files.

subMembers.name: selectButtonText
subMembers.description: The text displayed on the button that opens the file browser.

subMembers.name: showFileList
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not the UI component displays the list of selected files.

subMembers.name: uploadAbortedMessage
subMembers.description: The message displayed by the UI component when the file upload is cancelled.

subMembers.name: uploadButtonText
subMembers.description: The text displayed on the button that starts uploading.

subMembers.name: uploadChunk
subMembers.description: A function that uploads a file in chunks.

subMembers.name: uploadCustomData
subMembers.description: Specifies custom data for the upload request.

subMembers.name: uploadFailedMessage
subMembers.description: The message displayed by the UI component on uploading failure.

subMembers.name: uploadFile
subMembers.description: A function that uploads a file.

subMembers.name: uploadHeaders
subMembers.description: Specifies headers for the upload request.

subMembers.name: uploadMethod
subMembers.description: Specifies the method for the upload request.

subMembers.name: uploadMode
subMembers.description: Specifies how the UI component uploads files.

subMembers.name: uploadUrl
subMembers.description: Specifies a target Url for the upload request.

subMembers.name: uploadedMessage
subMembers.description: The message displayed by the UI component when uploading is finished.

subMembers.name: value
subMembers.description: Specifies a File instance representing the selected file. Read-only when [uploadMode] is *"useForm"*.

subMembers.name: Interfaces
subMembers.description: This section describes interfaces that the {WidgetName} component uses.

properties.name: dxFileUploader
properties.description: The FileUploader UI component enables an end user to upload files to the server. An end user can select files in the file explorer or drag and drop files to the FileUploader area on the page.

Methods.name: removeFile(fileIndex)
Methods.description: Removes a file with the specified index.

Methods.name: reset(value)
Methods.description: Resets the [value] property to the value passed as an argument.

Methods.name: upload(fileIndex)
Methods.description: Uploads a file with the specified index.

Events.name: onBeforeSend
Events.description: A function that allows you to customize the request before it is sent to the server.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onDropZoneEnter
Events.description: A function that is executed when the mouse enters a drop zone while dragging a file.

Events.name: onDropZoneLeave
Events.description: A function that is executed when the mouse leaves a drop zone as it drags a file.

Events.name: onFilesUploaded
Events.description: A function that is executed when the file upload process is complete.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onProgress
Events.description: A function that is executed when a file segment is uploaded.

Events.name: onUploadAborted
Events.description: A function that is executed when the file upload is aborted.

Events.name: onUploadError
Events.description: A function that is executed when an error occurs during the file upload.

Events.name: onUploadStarted
Events.description: A function that is executed when the file upload is started.

Events.name: onUploaded
Events.description: A function that is executed when a file is successfully uploaded.

Events.name: onValueChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when one or several files are added to or removed from the selection.

Events.name: beforeSend
Events.description: Raised before the request is sent to the server and allows you to customize this request.

Events.name: dropZoneEnter
Events.description: Raised when the mouse enters a drop zone as it drags a file.

Events.name: dropZoneLeave
Events.description: Raised when the mouse leaves a drop zone as it drags a file.

Events.name: filesUploaded
Events.description: Raised when the file upload process is complete.

Events.name: progress
Events.description: Raised when a file segment is uploaded.

Events.name: uploadAborted
Events.description: Raised when the file upload is aborted.

Events.name: uploadError
Events.description: Raised when an error occurs during the file upload.

Events.name: uploadStarted
Events.description: Raised when the file upload is started.

Events.name: uploaded
Events.description: Raised when a file is successfully uploaded.

Events.name: valueChanged
Events.description: Raised when one or several files are added to or removed from the selection.

subMembers.name: BeforeSendEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [beforeSend] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: DropZoneEnterEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [dropZoneEnter] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: DropZoneLeaveEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [dropZoneLeave] event handler's argument.

Types.name: FileUploadMode
Types.description: Specifies how the UI component uploads files.

Types.name: FilesUploadedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [filesUploaded] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: ProgressEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [progress] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: UploadAbortedEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [uploadAborted] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: UploadErrorEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [uploadError] event handler's argument.

Types.name: UploadHttpMethod
Types.description: Specifies the method for the upload request.

subMembers.name: UploadStartedEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [uploadStarted] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: UploadedEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [uploaded] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: ValueChangedEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [valueChanged] event handler's argument.
